title: TRIAX - AI Assisted Dispatching
description: Designed a web app that uses Mistral speech-to-text to provide real-time transcription of emergency dispatch calls and automatic pinging of other emergency units when keywords are mentioned. Awarded the 'Most Likely to Become a Successful Startup' prize at the hackathon.

title: CoDootor Code Comprehension Tutor
description: Designed a web app where students describe functions in plain English to test their code comprehension skills, generating code using an LLM based on their description to determine functional equivalency. Created using Docker, React/NextJS, and ExpressJS in a team of four following Agile methodology.

title: UBC TA Scheduler
description: Designed a TA scheduler using HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to track TA availability and automatically assign them to tutorials and office hours, saving over 30 hours of work. Implemented a REST API using AWS Lambda and API Gateway linked to MongoDB for persistent data storage.

title: Personalized Medicine Clinic App
description: Designed a Java application to diagnose patients with genetic diseases by comparing their genome with a genetic disease's sequence using OOP design. Implemented persistent data storage using a JSON library and a GUI using Swing. Utilized JUnit 5 to design unit tests to ensure program robustness.
